mapper.update: update topic set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, souName = #{souname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creatorId = #{creatorid,jdbcType=CHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, replyCount = #{replycount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lastReplyTime = #{lastreplytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, eventId = #{eventid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=TINYINT}, topicPic = #{topicpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handlePic = #{handlepic,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where topicId = #{topicid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select topicId, title, type, description, souName, creatorId, createTime, replyCount, lastReplyTime, eventId, enable, topicPic, handlePic from topic where topicId = #{topicid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select topicId, title, type, description, souName, creatorId, createTime, replyCount, lastReplyTime, eventId, enable, topicPic, handlePic from topic
